channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Young men want to get big. For some, it's becoming an obsession
item.description: Some teen boys are determined to grow more muscular to match their social media idols. Going to the gym and manipulating their diet can become compuls...

item.title: The risks of AI in schools outweigh the benefits, report says
item.description: A new report warns that AI poses a serious threat to children's cognitive development and emotional well-being.

item.title: Trump administration sends letter wiping out addiction, mental health grants
item.description: The Trump administration sent hundreds of letters Tuesday terminating federal grants supporting mental health and drug addiction services.

item.title: Las vacunas ayudan a las personas mayores más de lo que se pensaba

item.title: Vaccines Are Helping Older People More Than We Knew
item.description: Many shots seem to have “off-target” benefits, such as lowering the risk of dementia, studies have found.

item.title: States Race To Launch Rural Health Transformation Plans

item.title: Más refugios atienden necesidades médicas de personas mayores sin techo

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.
